attributes.action: Hold a Referendum on introducing a Full Representation Single Transferable (STV) Voting System before the next General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We propose to replace the FPTP voting system with a full representation system. We favour the Single Transferable Vote (STV) system which is already used in Northern Ireland successfully. All votes of the People of the UK should be fully represented in Parliament. A Public Referendum should be held before the next General Election to decide if this change should be introduced. Now may be the only time for this option to be given to the Public.
